flawed_nl_solution:
The discount is 45*0.2=$<<45*0.2=9>>9 off each pair
So she pays 45-9= $<<45-9=39>>39 each
So it will cost 39*10=$<<39*10=390>>390 before tax
The tax will add 390*0.1=$<<390*0.1=39>>39
So she has to pay 390+39=$<<390+39=429>>429
#### 429

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 39. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
